activities - package activities
 
Actor - Class in game.actor
Responsible for having and setting a location, being shown and hidden and being hit.
Actor(Placer, Sprite) - Constructor for class game.actor.Actor
Creates a new actor that is placed with the injected placer and draws itself with the passed sprite.
add(int) - Method in interface game.interfaces.status.Scorer
Adds a value to the score
add(int) - Method in class game.Score
Adds to the score
addActor(Actor) - Method in class game.GameBoard
Registers an actor that wants to interact with the game.
addGameComponent(GameComponent) - Method in class game.loops.GameLoop
Adds a game component to be called each time the game loop runs
addMeerkats(Bitmap) - Method in class gamebuilder.GameBuilder
Adds meerkats to the game
addPausable(Pausable) - Method in class game.Game
Registers a pausable component with the game
addScore(TextView) - Method in class gamebuilder.GameBuilder
Creates a score entity to keep score
addShowLevelEnd(EndLevelStarter) - Method in class gamebuilder.GameBuilder
Shows the level end screen when the level finishes
addSoundPool(Context) - Method in class gamebuilder.GameBuilder
Adds a sound pool so the game can play sound
addStopListener(OnStopListener) - Method in class game.loops.GameLoop
